simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Scheduler application entry point and main process loop.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Scheduler application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize the cFE Events with CFS Scheduler Application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs those steps required to initialize the relationship between the CFS Scheduler and the cFE Events Services.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize cFE Software Bus with CFS Scheduler Application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs those steps required to initialize the relationship between the CFS Scheduler and the cFE Software Bus.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize cFE Table Services with CFS Scheduler Application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs those steps required to initialize the relationship between the CFS Scheduler and the cFE Table Services.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize cFE Table Services with cFE Time Services and OSAL timer.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs those steps required to initialize the relationship between the CFS Scheduler and cFE Time Services as well as with the OS Abstraction Layer Timer Interface.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Processes the Schedule Table to determine next Minor Frame.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the highest level operations associated with processing the Schedule Definition Table. It determines which minor frame schedule definitions are to be processed during this cycle.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Processes the next minor frame in schedule definition table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the high level operations associated with processing a minor frame definition in the Schedule Definition Table.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Processes the next entry in the current minor frame.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes the next entry in the current minor frame as defined in the schedule definition table.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Processes commands received from cFE Software Bus.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function pulls messages from command pipe and processes them accordingly.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Validates contents of Schedule Definition Table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called by table services when a validation of the Schedule Definition Table is required.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Validates contents of Message Definition Table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called by table services when a validation of the Message Definition Table is required.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None
